item.title: Games Shelf REST/GraphQL App developed with Go and React
item.description: Since I started using Go on a project at my current job, I decided to create some real projects with the language to understand it better. After studying some patterns and understanding how Go works, I decided to create a Games Shelf Application with REST communication, and later, I added GraphQL to the mix. I chose PostgreSQL as my database and React.js for the front-end. Even though I haven’t used them for a long time, both are my preferred technologies for databases and front-end frameworks.
